Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander recorded a triple-double with 35 points, 6 rebounds, and 7 assists.
Jalen Williams had 14 points, 10 rebounds, 8 assists, and 2 steals.
Desmond Bane contributed 22 points, 9 rebounds, and 4 assists for the Grizzlies.
John Konchar grabbed 15 rebounds and added 4 points and 2 blocks.
Pre-Game Insights: Ja Morant was inactive for the Grizzlies.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander was expected to dominate the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed pride in his team's performance after the win.
